page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT K.MALZEARD
page.content: Unemployment is relatively low at 5%. Many people commute to work and in the area the main employment is{farming} with approximately 39 farms,many of which are small units which are unable to support a family.Many farms are dairy with milk collected by bulk tanker and delivered to the dairy. {Kirkby Malzeard Dairy}is the largest employer,with 60 staff on a shift system.Cheese is produced by traditional methods & much is exported There are 7 shops,5 of which sell food The{handweavers}is a family run craft shop specialising in handweaving.The company began in 1971,originally weaving on 2 looms but concentrating now on manufacturing looms which are exported.There are several{building & allied firms,including{painters & {decorators.}There are 4{public houses, all cater,3 are residential.
